It's great how God is allowing evil & wickedness to run rampant & have done nothing about it yet. It all makes sense if you understand
It's great how God is allowing evil & wickedness to run rampant & have done nothing about it yet. It all makes sense if you understand.
I'm not being sarcastic when I say that. It really is great because in hell, there is no pain threshold. The evil and wicked people of the world is digging themselves a deeper hole for their punishment. I'm glad Jesus hasn't intervene yet. I want the worst level of punishment for these evil bastards and the only way for that to happen is if more time is given to them to cause more havok and turmoil.
Don't think it will be just as easy for them to find salvation. We've seen videos of so called Christians who attended church all their lives and still ended up in hell for the smallest sin, if it's hard for Christians to go to heaven how much harder will it be for these wicked evil pos.
This goes for the unbeliever as well. The more time that's been given to you to repent, the worse your punishment will be.
With that being said, the 2nd coming can wait a little longer.
